DEMO_507_MSG_010:
̂This is the Virtual Colosseum. An institute created 
for the sole purpose of exclusively training Monster Masters.
DEMO_507_MSG_020: ̂Allow me one moment to confirm that you are an authorized user of this training facility.
DEMO_507_MSG_030:
̂My scan indicates that ȁ is indeed confirmed... Now registering this Master's information...
ā
DEMO_507_MSG_040:
̂You have been identified as Master #%ls...
Welcome to training, Master ȁ.
ā
DEMO_507_MSG_050:
̂Master ȁ, you are now eligible for our 
A-Rank service. Let me go over the details.
ā
DEMO_507_MSG_060: ̂Monster Masters with A-Rank eligibility can learn the Aerial Ride technique.
DEMO_507_MSG_070:
̂This ability allows a Master to ride aboard a flying monster while flying and gliding through the air around them.
ā
DEMO_507_MSG_080: ̂Expanding your horizons and taking advantage of this opportunity is a key step on your journey ahead.
DEMO_507_MSG_090: ̂Proceed to the gate ahead, where a combat test will be administered.
